MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G71 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:45am due to a fault on the underground cable network on Laburnum Road and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further work is required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:08 AM on Monday, 08 February 2021.
